-Roy Batty, “Blade Runner”}} ==Useful Info== '''Polymoths''' are dangerous [[list of insects|insects]] which magnify the threat posed by any monsters they come into contact with. They will occasionally [[polymorph]] any nearby monsters into different, stronger monsters, though the chance of them doing so falls rapidly as the monster's [[HD]] rises. ==History== Polymoths were considered for addition in [[0.13]], and could be encountered in [[trunk]] for a brief time, but were never included in a stable version.
